TopicTitle: How can I get SVT to work with KSP 1.3?

Articles.Content: Is it possible to get stock visual terrain to work with KSP 1.3 or not?

Stock Visual Terrain needs Kopernicus to run, as that's the mechanism SVT uses to apply the new terrain textures and enable scatter objects to have colliders. But I've read that Kopernicus 1.3.0-3 and later have a problem generating scatter objects to begin with.

Try installing the 1.3.0-2 release first and make sure your game launches. You'll know Kopernicus is active if the main menu's Kerbin view first shows the desert continent instead of the continent where the KSC resides. Then put the SVT folder back and see how things look after that.
